responses.gpt4: Thank you for sharing that, Mr. Valenzuela. We truly hope that this procedure will offer some answers for your long-lasting diarrhea. I'll note down for your care team to review it. Are you ready to move on and discuss a few topics on preparation for your colonoscopy?
responses.our_model: I see, Mr. Valenzuela. I hope this procedure gives you and your doctor the answers you're looking for. Would it be okay if we go over a few topics on prep for your colonoscopy?
